articles.description: INTERVIEW BY FABRIZIO FERRARI: Sacchi says Inter Milan and Juventus focus heavily on their key stars - but praised AC Milan for an ability to perform without Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
articles.content:
Legendary former AC Milan and Italy boss Arrigo Sacchi has delivered a fascinating assessment on the tussle for the Serie A title this season.
Sacchi, now 74, believes Inter Milan and Juventus place… [+3061 chars]
